name: ST04_03.BIN
original:
<DIALOG2>Say, you're kind of
cute...Your name's
MegaMan, isn't it?<NEXT>You're my type of
man!...I don't know
if you like looking<NEXT>at women's clothes,
but come back and
see me anytime![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I really like this
dress--<NEXT>do you think it
would look good
on me?<NEXT>[0xa1]1[0x0]D1[0x0][0x0][0x80][0x0][0xa0][0xff][0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x0]34[0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Really? Will you
buy it for me,
then?<NEXT>[0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x0][0xff][0xff][0x83][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Oh, don't worry--I

know how to treat
a lady, do you?<NEXT>Humph![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Hi there, MegaMan!<NEXT>Are you looking for
something?<NEXT>Red chalk? For
drawing?<NEXT>I didn't know you
were an artist!<NEXT>We don't have any
red chalk, but
we've got some<NEXT>red lipstick...
Would that do?<NEXT>[0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x0]76[0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8No? That's too

it? OK, then, here!<NEXT>I'll give you
mine...<NEXT>I'm sorry, I've
already used it a
little...<NEXT>Oh, don't worry
about paying me...<NEXT>I'm just glad I
could help you,
MegaMan...<NEXT>See you later!<NEXT>[0x8a][0x86][0x0]You got:
[0x85]3[0xcc][0x49][0x85][0x0][0x96][0x49]5![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]h[0x0]5[0xff]<DIALOG2>I'm so glad the
trouble's over and
our customers are<NEXT>coming back...I'm
in such a good mood
maybe I'll throw a<NEXT>bargain sale...Do
you want to buy
something, MegaMan?<NEXT>How about a
present for your
girlfriend?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I may not look like
a movie star or
anything, but I<NEXT>like to dress up
and look nice some-
times too, you know![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I wonder which one
I should buy...<NEXT>It's so hard to
make up my mind
'cause everything<NEXT>looks so good on
me![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]h[0x0]5[0xff]<DIALOG2>Why don't you bring
your girlfriend
along sometime?<NEXT>I'd love to meet
her![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I made up my mind!
I'm going to buy
this one!<NEXT>It's time I gave
myself a new look![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I still can't make
up my mind on what
I want to buy...<NEXT>Maybe I should just
give up and go
home...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]h[0x0]5[0xff]<DIALOG2>You've been real
busy chasing after
those pirates<NEXT>lately, haven't
you, MegaMan? I
knew you were the<NEXT>hero type the first
time I saw you! I
just knew it!<NEXT>Maybe someday
you'll come save
me...<NEXT>hee hee hee[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>They told me they

but I don't know--<NEXT>would you buy some-
thing that's been
on display?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I came here looking
for a present for
my girlfriend...<NEXT>I'm a little embar-
rassed being in here
by myself, though...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Not many customers
here yet...<NEXT>Maybe I opened up
the shop too early?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8rustle...rustle...<NEXT>Sounds like some-
one's inside...<NEXT>Woman's voice
"Hmmm...waist's a
little too tight...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8.[0x87]8[0x0].[0x87]8[0x0].[0x87]8[0x0]
Looks like there's
no one inside...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0][0xa2][0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8You can see yourself
in the mirror...<NEXT>Maybe not as
handsome as some,<NEXT>but it's a good-
looking face...<NEXT>You feel a little
more confident after
looking at yourself.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]h[0x0]5[0xff]<DIALOG2>Good luck, MegaMan!
We're all big fans
of yours![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I don't know what I
should get my
girlfriend...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Hmmmm...I wonder if
everything's going
to be all right...<NEXT>When I get stressed
out, I always want
to go shopping.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]h[0x0]5[0xff]<DIALOG2>I heard you went
inside the Main
Gate!<NEXT>Wow...Is there any-
thing you can't do,
MegaMan?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I got a present
from my boyfriend,
but I don't really<NEXT>like it that much,
so I came here to
exchange it...<NEXT>Don't tell him, OK?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]h[0x0]5[0xff]<DIALOG2>Oh, MegaMan, I'm
so frightened...<NEXT>Can you stay here
and protect me?<NEXT>Oh, I know...You've
got to protect<NEXT>everyone--not
just me...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>On second thought,
I'll keep the
clothes I got--<NEXT>I mean, after all,
they were a
present, right?<NEXT>I wouldn't want to
hurt my boyfriend's
feelings![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>The woman who works
at the grocer's is
usually so healthy--<NEXT>I wonder if something
happened to her...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]Z2L[0xff]<DIALOG2>The grocer's wife
still hasn't come
back yet...<NEXT>I wonder if she's
all right...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I heard the
grocer's wife gave
birth to a healthy<NEXT>baby boy...I'm so
glad to know she's
all right...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]
